document.full_text: monday, march 7, marks the 200th anniversary of the birth of dr. increase allen lapham, who many recognize as the father of the national weather service.
document.title: happy 200th birthday to the father of the weather service
lines_and_colors: monday, march 7, marks the 200th anniversary of the birth of dr. increase allen lapham, who many recognize as the father of the national weather service.
